text: Thembisa is a township in Johannesburg, South Africa. It was founded in 1957 to accommodate black South Africans during Apartheid. It has about 19,000 people.| 3 killed, 2 injured in shooting in Tembisa | News24| Stripped naked and beaten: Tembisa land occupiers accuse police of brutality | News24 == References == Category:Towns in South Africa Category:Johannesburg
title: Thembisa
